    • Method Detail

      • start

        public void start()
        The method to start the RMI server.

        It starts the Registry and makes it listen at the port PORT. It creates an instance of the server, that offers the service to the client.

        Specified by:
        start in class Server

      • stop

        public void stop()
        The method to interrupt the server.

        It unbinds the remote object.

        Specified by:
        stop in class Server

      • isRunning

        public boolean isRunning()
        The method that tells if the server is running.
        Specified by:
        isRunning in class Server
        Returns:
        true if the RMI server is running, false otherwise.
